actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to make the ground water heat pump eligible for residential energy and investment tax credits.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make certain types of heat pumps eligible for the residential energy income tax credit and the investment tax credit for energy property. Qualifies for such credit heat pumps which transmit or use solar energy stored in ground water.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to make the ground water heat pump eligible for residential energy and investment tax credits.
